localizations.err_session_expired_msg: Your session has expired, please sign in again.

localizations.welcome_please_login_text: To begin, please login with your credentials.

localizations.main_menu_item_walk_throughs_descr: A step-by-step instructional guide on how to complete module tasks.

localizations.main_menu_item_practices_descr: A mode that allows you to practice tasks with minimal guidance.

localizations.main_menu_item_assessments_descr: Tests that assess your competency for completing tasks with no guidance.

localizations.main_menu_item_videos_descr: Instructional videos that give a bit more in-depth information.

localizations.err_user_story_not_exist_msg: Sorry, this lesson does not longer exist.

localizations.err_user_story_updated_msg: This lesson has been updated. To complete the lesson, you need to pass it again.

localizations.note_user_story_changed_text: Please note: the list of lessons has been changed.

localizations.err_user_story_not_exist_text: Sorry, lesson "%s" does not longer exist.

localizations.err_app_not_avail_msg: The app content is no longer available. Please refresh the screen.

localizations.welcome_description: Learn and practice how to use the apps you need to do your job in a anxiety free and self-paced manner. No need to worry about breaking anything.
